name: Our Human Planet
tag_list: humanitarian, telemedicine, humanitarian-crisis, technology, social-network, reliefpod, disaster-encampments, emergency-encampment
overview:
Our Human Planet supplies mobile medical, water purification, food and other critically needed relief programs to hundreds of thousands of victims of disaster and humanitarian crises in many of the most remote and damaged areas of our world.

Our Human Planet specializes in NEXT GENERATION RELIEF TECHNOLOGIES.

At the top of our list is our ability to communicate directly from our relief efforts in the field back to the compassionate hearts who support us around the world. For us transparency and accountability are much more than mere words or marketing rhetoric.

At Our Human Planet the technologies we deploy affords you a front row seat to clearly see what we do, where we do it, how we do it and for whom we do it. No smoke and mirrors. No hype. Just clear and easily understood accountability to those who help us help others.
